website_summaries.verdict: The general feedback on the Ryka Dynamic 2.5 was quite positive. It was praised for its comfort, cushioning, breathability, and other features. It performed well during various types of training, including the high-intensity ones. However, several consumers still wished for more cushioning in the midsole unit. In spite of several gripes about the insole and the durability, the footgear still exceeded the expectations of many.
pros: Those who used the Ryka Dynamic 2.5 for gym training, HIIT, aerobics, dance-based workouts, kickboxing, and all-day wear were very happy with its performance
A majority of reviewers described the shoe as comfortable
Most testers appreciated the great cushioning provided during high-impact exercises
The trainer was quite breathable, according to a number of wearers
The lightweight nature of the shoe was a welcome feature for many training aficionados
A handful of reviewers took note of the good traction of the outsole
The shoe’s performance during lateral movements received praise from those who used it for intensive training
To a wearer with plantar fasciitis, it was able to provide agreeable support to the underside of the foot
Several users with high arches expressed contentment with the arch support of the insole
The trainer ran true to size, as stated by most testers
A user appreciated the rounded toe style of the shoe as it offered more room in the toe box section
cons: Several wearers felt uncomfortable with the insole
apparently, the arch support in it was excessive for them
A few reviewers complained about the quality because the sole peeled and the upper developed holes

customer_reviews.title: I actually made a comment on stage how great they felt and how "springy" I am now
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing Jazzercise for 1.5 yrs. All this time with the wrong shoes. Now that I'm an instructor, I ordered these. I actually made a comment on stage how great they felt and how "springy" I am now! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Dzurko

customer_reviews.title: so I tried them and am really happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I teach and take RIPPED classes and these shoes were talked about on our instructor's page. It was about time to get another pair, so I tried them and am really happy with them! Because I have high arches, I was using a volleyball shoe that worked great but had a little smaller toe box which I was used to. But I just lace these up a little tighter and they're working just great! Very lightweight. First time with this brand but I will definitely be back!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L

customer_reviews.title: The size runs small!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 1/2 size up from my regular shoe, and the same size as my running shoes (Asics), but these are tighter around the toes than I prefer. I recommend ordering one full size up from your regular shoe, or 1/2 size up from your running/training shoes. Everyone loves the blue/green/yellow color. I like the padding around the ankle which is thicker than any other shoes I own. I'm hoping they stretch a little as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Barton

customer_reviews.title: Why did Ryka ruin a wonderful shoe?
customer_reviews.text: This shoes do not measure up to the old Transpires or Dynamics. First, the point where the cushion surrounding the back of the ankle meets the plastic shoe lace strip was noticeably frayed. Second, the upper cushion around the back of the ankle was too thick, forcing the foot forward so that the toes were squashed, but allowing the heel to painfully rub with each step. The bottom of the shoes were identical in size and shape to the old, beloved Dynamics. After a very short time, I had to pause my workout to change shoes because my big toes went numb.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A. Wooden

customer_reviews.title: but I put in a shoe support insert and they are perfect. I cannot order a 1/2 size smaller for ...
customer_reviews.text: I need supportive athletic shoes for Jazzercise. These take over the Dynamic 2 shoe, there is a little more room in the toe area, but I put in a shoe support insert and they are perfect. I cannot order a 1/2 size smaller for my toes are at the top. If you jazzercise, hi impact cardio excercise, please keep that in mind when ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I ordered a half size up and was glad I did. There would be no give to the fabric this shoe is made from. The material is lightweight and appears would be easy to clean. I seem to have less heel pain when walking with these shoes but perhaps due to my other sneakers being worn out. So far so good. The tongue is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a cardio weight class on a gym studio floor. My old shoes slid around too much. These are great! They don't slip, and inside the shoe, my foot stays anchored and doesn't slide too much either. They are true to size, and comfy. I had never tried this brand, but I just ordered a pair of their running shoes too. I'm usually a skechers and altra girl, but they are expensive! These are a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Painful, but cute!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great on day 1-20. Adorable shoe style...however, then they didn't fit right on my right foot in the arch. The feeling got worse, my foot hurt every day for 7 more days, even with Dr. Scholl's work inserts!! So I tossed them. I work 12 hr nights standing and walking, I need reliable shoes....
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I've worn almost exclusively Ryka shoes for more than 20 years. This is my new favorite style. Dynamic 2.5 has the ortholite sole I prefer, an excellent arch support, and the upper material that feels like it will maintain its integrity for a while. I'm getting ready for my 2nd 10 K in a few weeks, and I'll be wearing these. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O'Shea

customer_reviews.title: No arch support, little cushion
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 9, my usual size, but they seemed slightly too small. I have a narrow heel, an average arch, and wider front with a slight inward pronation. These shoes just didn't fit my feet correctly, and forced my pronation more inward. Returned. They also feel a bit rigid and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Landy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love Dynamic 2.5 by Ryka, but they had a small design defect that has evidently been addressed. This is the 6th pair I have purchased. I note that the construction has been improved over the last 2 pairs (black) that I bought, which is a good thing. Those black pairs split where the toe reinforcement met the mesh shoe top on one shoe in each of those two pairs. Frustrating. Now in my new purchase I note that the toe reinforcement now appears to be applied over a complete top section (rather than only butting up to the edge) so I expect this pair won't be subject to that splitting.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Chik

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Too small. The toe box is really narrow. I was disappointed in the quality as well. The tongue is really thin and does not seem like it will hold up long. I am returning because I need a sturdier shoe with more toe space for the level of exercise I do.
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: BLISTERS!! BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This is what's left over from the gigantic water blister that I had on BOTH heels after wearing the sneakers for 10 minutes. I went for a walk around the neighborhood. Nothing strenuous like running or jumping, and my heels have been torn up for days trying to recover. The sneakers seemed to fit great and seemed quite comfortable when I tried them on but clearly, they are cut in a way that destroys the backs of your heel
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, just not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Despite other reviews, the fit was true to size. I ordered a half size up (due to the reviews) and they were too big. I returned them for my true size, which fit and I almost kept them until I found a better fitting workout/running shoe. The heel slid somewhat as a walked. It wasn't the size, because my foot length fit perfectly. These shoes seem sturdy and attractive, but I personally minded the slight sliding of my heel in the shoe. I realize some shoes do this, but for what I needed the shoes for, it was a problem. I returned them and bought some snug running shoes from a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha*

customer_reviews.title: Great support and cushion
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Got them for my HIIT and cardio classes. They fit well with my red outfits and give me excellent cushioning and support. I saw some reviews that the mesh rips, well, I’m an instructor who teaches 10+ classes per week, and I have 20+ sneakers. If they rip- get new ones, shoes are not meant to last forever. These will serve me well for next 6-12 months :) love them! Beautiful and my feet are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Red at DSW. I got the blue here at Amazon with a discount they came to $38 - I wear a size 8 and these fit perfect. They have good lateral support for my workouts and they are very comfortable. I have knee issues and these do not hurt my knees when walking (the red are for walking, the blue are for my workouts) or working out. I'm thinking of going back for the black pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, just didn't fit right.
customer_reviews.text: I liked these, but I ordered my usual size and my toes hit the end of the shoe. Back they went. They are cute and I was sorry to let them go. I think a whole size up would have made them too big. The fabric of the shoe has a fun pattern and the stripe decoration is a nice add on.
customer_reviews.author: Cow Town Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for HIIT and cardio workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and toe area so the previous review regarding a narrow toe box is correct! What this meant to me is FINALLY I'll have a shoe that fits my toes and give them the support I need allowing me to move in all directions without sliding around in the toe box. So if you have a narrow ankle, higher arches, and a narrow toe area, these shoes are for you
customer_reviews.author: momof three

customer_reviews.title: Walking Shoe of Choice
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the shoe cushions my feet, I use the shoe for walking. This is my second pair of Ryka’s, my walking shoe of choice, probably will not purchase any other brand because the brand is definitely one of the best fits for women.
customer_reviews.author: R King

customer_reviews.title: Great for Zumba/ Mixxedfit but.....
customer_reviews.text: I loved how these felt during both Zumba and Mixxedfit. I ordered in both red and black. The only downfall to these shoes is that after 5 months the sole has completely came off of the pair I wear the most. 3 stars because I loved them while they lasted but need a shoe that will last longer. update... I love this shoe so I bought another pair hoping they would be better. After only wearing for 3 days the soles in this pair are coming unglued as well. So disappointing. These shoes are so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a more narrow fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and arch support; I have very high arches and very often my cross trainers don't support...these do! It doesn't hurt that they are also so cool looking, love the color, the feel with the mesh material is awesome and they make your foot look small! I won't know how they hold up for awhile and I am not overly hard on them as I run on a treadmill and weight train mainly (no long distance on rough terrain).
customer_reviews.author: Lora

customer_reviews.title: Thank You RYKA!
customer_reviews.text: How great to find a 10 1/2!! For some strange reason most women's shoes/sneakers go from 10 to 11. These are perfect! They are lightweight yet offer great support. May be getting another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: I found the "out-step" (if that's a word) had an arch in it that was not comfortable. The outside edge of my foot felt like ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned these. I found the "out-step" (if that's a word) had an arch in it that was not comfortable. The outside edge of my foot felt like it was being pushed up. I also disliked that when you pulled the laces tight, the shoe has a bump/gap at the base of the laces. Maybe OK for a wider foot, but did not work for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little stiff at first but after wearing them for a day, super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: When I first put them on they were a little stiff, but as the day went on, they began to mold to my feet. They are very comfortable and I would definitely recommend them. They are true to size. Update: 4 months later they are ripping from the seam. I circled the white part where I noticed the tear and I'm wearing black socks so it isn't my socks showing through.
customer_reviews.author: msbri1

customer_reviews.title: Love the way they fit
customer_reviews.text: After buying 1 pair of Ryka shoes I had to have another pair and then now I am up to 8 pairs. I love the way that they fit. I have small feet and they don't make them look even smaller like other brands do. The arch is supportive and the heel cups around the foot and they are designed only for women's feet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mediger

customer_reviews.title: They're red.  I wanted red.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I'm retired and the only place I go reguarly is the gym. I like to have color-coordinated outfits. Needed red shoes. As others have noted, the materials in this shoe seem even more "plasticy" than most. Other than that, they're not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my third attempt to purchase a comfortable pair of athletic shoes. $200 dollars later I FINALLY found one !! I gave s high arch and find most athletic shoes also rub my heel. Not these!! They fit perfectly and I experienced no discomfort at all. My first day of use I had them on all day. I felt like I had my bedroom slippers on. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jade VonHawley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe, just need a wide
customer_reviews.text: I wear between a 8 and a 8.5 - the 8.5 on my left foot was perfect but way to snug in my right. Maybe just me. I don’t know if sizing up to a 9 would fix this. Would a a great shoe if available in a wide . I do have to say the tongue material is weird and feels like plastic. I could overlook this because they were so comfortable just to restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: Pickles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable work out shoes I have ever owned. I have terrible feet - a bunion and flat feet but these shoes are comfortable during a walk or workout. I wear 8 1/2 B in every day shoes but ordered a 9 B in these and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable shoes. Been wearing them for my higher impact workouts. The reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is this shoe has a very thin tongue. I find it harder to get the shoes tied comfortably and I'm continuously having to readjust them during my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very breathable for workouts
customer_reviews.text: Extremely breathable! I returned a pair of Ascics because the toe area was crushing my foot and I don't have wide feet. These were perfect as a replacement. I feel like they have all the points I was looking for in terms of fit, support, and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: April KellyWright

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: After trying 4 or 5 other pairs of Ryka for my Jazzercise class, I finally found a pair that are true to size and don't run wide in the toe box. I love these! They are very supportive yet flexible in the arch. The have Ortholite so they are very cushioned. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Beakemhawks

customer_reviews.title: Decent for Jazzercise, not spectacular.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been searching for a decent Jazzercise shoe. I’ve tried on many, and so far this one is decent. Enough cush, adequate support, enough wiggle for my toes. My only complaint is it doesn’t offer enough ankle support. It’s just a really low riding shoe. I’ve struggled finding a good Ryka since they discontinued both my previous styles. I’m still on the hunt for the perfect shoe to wear for Jazzercise, but this one is working.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A Malone

customer_reviews.title: Much too small even though I sized up
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted these to work. Love that they are mesh with an antimicrobial footbed, lightweight and good looking. But they are way too small. I usually wear a women's 8 1/2 or 9. I ordered the 9 since some reviews indicated they run on the smaller side. I could barely get them on, thinking I had mistakenly received a size 7 or 8! But in fact they were the size 9 I had ordered. I had even tried them on first thing in the morning as my podiatrist suggested. But my big toes were literally crushed up against the front of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very bright with average support
customer_reviews.text: Not as light (as mentioned in other reviews) and with moderate cushion and arch support. There's thick lip-padding around the ankle/heel areas; however, my heels still slip unless the laces are wound very tightly. These cost less than 20d. so I'm happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Loved these SO much
customer_reviews.text: Loved these SO much, I ordered an extra pair! Great for Rumble, Ripped, Zumba, or cardio classes... or just for everyday wear!
customer_reviews.author: J. Roggow

customer_reviews.title: Order half a size up
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little smaller then expected and on the size chart. I usually wear a size 8 and like to go up half size for running shoes so got a 8.5. They fit a bit sung, should have gotten a 9. Over all love the color and how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: pretty much what i expected for a new athletic shoe. Good arch support, comfortable, just a little tight in the toe area but that will probably fix itself as i break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: One Year Old - Starting to Tear
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year. They hurt my arch a little bit when exercising. There is not much support. Mostly, I'm a bit annoyed they have a tear in them. I use them only at the gym. I feel like I should get at least 2 years out of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: fields of LA

customer_reviews.title: Has RYKA sizing changed?
customer_reviews.text: LOVED the color. Sent back because they were too small. Was hoping for another perfect RYKA fit. When the 9 comes down in price, I may try again.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I love them they're just a little tight at the top of my foot. I got them "used" for $27 and they showed up with tags on them so I'm ESTATIC!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sharp

customer_reviews.title: great brand, great price, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! fits great bought it half a size larger I'm a 10 so i got 10.5 and it's amazing. I definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, but runs an entire size too small
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe, but runs an entire size too small. I read the reviews, and ordered a 1/2 size up. The 1/2 size up was too small. I suggest to order an entire size up......I have to return my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Woo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful shoe! I love the toebox giving me ample room as well as the strong arch support. I feel like my feet are walking on clouds. I would buy this shoe again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with these shoes. They're lightweight but well padded so that I can walk and stand most of the day without discomfort. Many shoes rub the outside of my right little toe, but these ones fit well on both feet. Out of ten pairs I tried by various brands, including a different shoe by Ryka, this was the only pair that felt great. I like the appearance of the black and white, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Padded footbed lacking
customer_reviews.text: I find these shoes to be moderately comfortable. The footpad is not very soft and is uncomfortable for those of us with problem feet. I have lost the padding on the ball of my feet and these shoes did not help. I won't buy this shoe again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheron Rossow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I am using them for zumba and dance classes. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Someone has mentioned before that the size looks a little bulkier than it is supposed to be; which is true. They look a little big for my feet. However, they are very comfortable to wear for my dance classes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N

customer_reviews.title: Tight toes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes to fit over my bunions. They were labeled as “women’s” shoes because they have a boxier toe, in order to accommodate bunions. I found them too tight for comfort around my toes, even though the same size in a different style fit beautifully! I returned the shoes, but still had to pay for shipping (even though I have Prime).
customer_reviews.author: E Morris

customer_reviews.title: Quality is disappointing/fit is great.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed, these shoes fit my feet great, I wear them as everyday shoes for work, desk job plus walking to and from my desk, love the support. However with just light use of walking around its tearing on the left shoe. Just expected a better quality show that should be for cross training.
customer_reviews.author: Karl D.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but size up 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear Ryka and these are a great shoe but I found them a 1/2 size too small. Normally I wear a size 7 but when I reorder these I’ll be getting a 7.5. Great shoe overall
customer_reviews.author: Mme

customer_reviews.title: RYKA is always my go-to
customer_reviews.text: I have been exclusively purchasing RYKA brand cross-trainers for every kind of exercise - they consistently fit my feet the best. This pair is lightweight but supportive, and my narrow heel only slips a little (this is always my issue). Overall fit feels a little wider, but still supportive and secure. I will absolutely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit short .  Color is wow!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of these! Ordered my normal 8.5 and they were a bit too short. Exchanged them for a size 9. The 9’s are perfect. A very comfortable sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Docherty

customer_reviews.title: Another perfect pair of Ryka’s!!
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Ryka’s for 2 years now and needed a new pair for the gym. Order one size up(for me I wear a 7-7 1/2 and I ordered an 8 and they are perfect! No need to break them in, they are that amazing!! Order them,’you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Grzesik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for women!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They fit exactly right and they're supportive and cushion-y. Because Rykas are designed for women's feet, they fit better than any other brand I've ever worn. I really love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: C. Sheely

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have them in red and also black. Super cute, super comfy. More of a teal color than green....but even better!
customer_reviews.author: Yarra

customer_reviews.title: Nice workout shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking sneaker. Works well for lateral movements. Has nice cushioned soles some arch support. I prefered the Ryka vida Rzx because it had a slightly bigger toe bed and more of an arch support. This was my 2nd choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: I teach cross training and this is my only shoe that I will wear. Excellent product, excellent shoe! I highly recommend. And various colors, too
customer_reviews.author: Georgianne Riehle

customer_reviews.title: my foot slides around in these
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look and design of these shoes. BUT my feet feel like they are sliding around inside them and that's not good. it's a little uncomfortable. They aren't labeled as wide but on my feet they are wide. I use them for dance fitness work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of this shoe but the quality is lacking. Within a month the mesh upper on the shoe had begun to tear. I now just wear it for my walks.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hiserman

customer_reviews.title: Had to size up
customer_reviews.text: I usually size between an 8.5 and a 9. I ordered both, and neither worked! I am returning and hoping that 9.5 will fit because these look like awesome shoes in all other respects.
customer_reviews.author: KME

customer_reviews.title: These look and feel great. I'm disappointed I listened to other reviewers and ...
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel great. I'm disappointed I listened to other reviewers and ordered up a half size, I think my normal size would have been perfect. They are very roomy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fabric split
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers over a year ago. I had bought another pair and really liked them. Unfortunately, there has developed a split in the fabric on the top of the sneaker just below the below the toes. My first pair lasted over 3 years. I am disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Samaha

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe that fits my size well.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were perfect and most comfortable. I am using them for tennis and was pleased with the lightness of the shoe and was not disappointed with the shoe in any way. I'm sure that they will make my game even better.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Happy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka tennis shoes..these are true red...they make my feet so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Chancellor

customer_reviews.title: Tongue cuts into leg
customer_reviews.text: The tongue of the shoe was way too long and was so long that it cut into my foot. I had to return these sneakers. No other sneaker ever ever had had such a long tongue and I have dozens of pairs.
customer_reviews.author: DCadventurer

customer_reviews.title: I will only workout in these now!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after several other pairs frustrated me by not holding up or hurting my feet. These are hands down the best shoes I’ve ever worked out in. I probably wouldn’t use them for running but everything else they are it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these shoes! I thought they might be snug at first, but they fit perfectly! I've worked out 5x/week for years, and these are the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ford

customer_reviews.title: feels like left shoe sole is deformed
customer_reviews.text: feels like left shoe sole is deformed. It pushes up on side ball of foot. Unfortunately I ordered before major surgery, so I am trying them out well after purchase. I would have returned them as defective otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Tried them on and they were too small, kept them anyway and wore them to work out and they stretched out to be too big. Literally turned out sloppy big to the point of slipping and blisters.
customer_reviews.author: myredeemerlives

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It fits my feet perfectly and is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair, I love it. It fits my feet perfectly and is very comfortable. The only problem is the thin fabric on top tends split up in less than a year where you bend your toes. Other brands or styles did not do this.
customer_reviews.author: ZZmelly

customer_reviews.title: Very true to size.  This is my 5th pair of Ryka's and they all fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product because of my past experience. Good value and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Gifts and Everyday Uses

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Ryka fan for years; however now these shoes that I loved when I got them are already ripping at the top of the laces. POOR QUALITY. I love the look, feel, and how they perform but sadly they are not holding up. Will make me rethink buying Ryka gain. Amazon: can I return for defect?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Koller

customer_reviews.title: Highly underrated!
customer_reviews.text: In my search for the best womens trainers, I always come across Ryka among the list. I have foot problems (bunions, hammertoe) and surprisingly these shoes really understand women's feet. Its performance rivals the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ineliza L. Atienza

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE BRIGHT COLOR AND THEY ARE SOOOO COMFORTABLE. I NEVER BOUGHT THE RYKA BRAND BEFORE, BUT I WILL BUY IT AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Very flexible
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for Zumba. They are lightweight and very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: sandyclaws

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but bulky
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and super comfy. Great to workout in. They're a little more bulky than I expected but not bad overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna4692

customer_reviews.title: Toe area too SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The Dynamic 2.5 Cross-Trainer was returned because the toe area ran narrow. I purchased The Ryka Vivid RZX Cross Trainer And it Fits Great! True to size!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I went walking in these shoes and my arch started to hurt after walking only 2 miles. Will give them another try.
customer_reviews.author: QueenVRB

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a fitness instructor and needed shoes that are comfortable and I can teach back to back high impact classes without increased foot pain. These shoes are great and give me exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Shvarts

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Do not like these, the heal is uncomfortable. I have a previous pair of this brand and loved them I was disappointed in the fit and quality of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: Love Ryka. Purchased a pair of these a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka. Purchased a pair of these a few years ago and loved the show. Why try something else if it fits and looks nie. I went with the all black shoe this time and find that I can wear it with other clothing without looking like I am wearing tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: F86Jet

customer_reviews.title: Not sure this is what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Good arch support, but I am a Little disappointed in the side to side movement on the tread and no ankle support. Overall look of the shoe is nice, but not sure it will hold up to high intensity cardio/dance fitness classes that I teach.
customer_reviews.author: Stellarblu

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking but not great side support for side to side movements in dance type classes.
customer_reviews.author: Hope H Driskill

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: While they were comfortable, a piece of fabric on the side ripped off after just two months of indoor-only use. Other than the missing fabric, they look almost brand new, however I missed the return window by a couple of weeks. ~ Techno Man's Wife
customer_reviews.author: Techno Man

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gym shoes for doing weights, cardio, and body weight workouts. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Slone Griner

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, moderate arch support, wore all day, beautiful lime green color, love them
customer_reviews.author: GloMar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair from this brand, at this point will try to only buy from Ryka they fit me true to size.
customer_reviews.author: sagacity

customer_reviews.title: Bottom separating from body of shoe
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of moderate use in an aerobics class, the bottom of the shoe is peeling off at the toe. It fits perfectly and feels good on, but, since the return date has passed, I cannot return it. I won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Book Babe

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Flashy shoe for working out in
customer_reviews.text: Using this show for cross training and weight lifting, espeically Body Pump. Loving them so far!
customer_reviews.author: emills47

customer_reviews.title: I will order this shoe in other colors although this color will be hard to beat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Wore it to Jazzercise and it worked perfectly. It does run a tad smaller than some of my Ryka’s, but all that I had to do was wear a pair of my thinner socks. The color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They're comfortable and offer a lot of support during my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Kinat

customer_reviews.title: Broken before first wear
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t even worn these once, went to tighten the laces and the second loop broke. These will be returned and I’ll be buying a brand with better quality. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Dancing Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wore them for the first time to Jazzercize this morning, and they were fabulous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grow Bookkeeping, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. I love the spunky colors. The tongue is a weird thin sheet...probably not unusually these days, but I thought it was interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: All my Ryka shoes fit true to size. Used exclusively for Jazzercise as a studio show. Ryka is the only brand that I find the best fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Romanelli

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Felt great at first. The more I have worn them, the more the padding seems to be less soft (I have only had these for a few to several months). There is some room in the front above the toes that annoys me.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes. It’s so comfortable and true to size. It’s hugs quite well on my feet. It’s perfect for my intense classes. I highly recommend this shoes. It’s very stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Orbeta

customer_reviews.title: Wider shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoe. Great red color. Heel portion seems clunky and overall shoe feel is wide on my narrow women's 5.5 shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Hovde

customer_reviews.title: I like the color
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, the flap is flat so easy to tie up, and the support is great...perfect for Jazzercise.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

product_meta.title: RYKA Women's Dynamic 2.5 Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: A slight update to the influence 2, the influence 2.5 is designed to meet the needs of even the most intense fitness professionals. The upper on the influence 2 features mid and forefoot support and an independent lacing system that allows for custom fit and lateral support. The underfoot cushioning has been enhanced over the previous version by the addition of a re-zorb® sockliner.
